title: Faulty Offline Google Assistant
content:
Before, I can do offline google assistant commands ("open camera app," "send SMS to _", "start voice recording", etc).

Now, I cannot do offline google assistant commands anymore. I have checked online for solutions. The most common one is download "English (US)" for the Offline Voice Recognition and it should work.

I have done so, it didn't work. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the language; it still didn't work. I have attached a screenvid for reference.

Google team, please help me with this. I think Google is advance enough to offer bug fixes WITHOUT doing a system-wide reset. I do not want to do a reset.

Thanks
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
